channel.title: Anyone got ::god command[pi]
channel.description: does anyone got that god command. The one that makes you fly not really sure what it is called. Thanks,Nick :)

item.title: Anyone got ::god command[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

s w 3 3 t1:

but i am using pi.

Yeah delete the c.

Typed that up in about a minute so cbf to make it perfect

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone got ::god command[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:386526”]Simple

Commands class

if (playerCommand.startsWith("god")) c.god = true;

In your client class declare this

Then in your Process() method add this

if(god == true) { c.playerStandIndex = 1501; c.playerWalkIndex = 1851; c.playerRunIndex = 1851; }[/quote]Wrong… Just set their animations when initiating the player command. No need to give crappy Project Insanity servers more code to process every cycle. This is why your server’s cycle time is greater than 600ms…

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone got ::god command[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

Why is there a “c.”?
It’s already in the client class, so there no need to.
Most likely just look where those void are and let it go look through that file.
Can be “p” “pa” not sure.
If the method is in client class than just delete the “c.”

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone got ::god command[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:5, topic:386526”]hey, i added everything right and i got this error,

src\server\model\players\Client.java:349: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class server.model.players.Client
c.playerStandIndex = 1501;
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:350: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class server.model.players.Client
c.playerWalkIndex = 1851;
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:351: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class server.model.players.Client
c.playerRunIndex = 1851;
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
You’re most likely not using Project Insanity.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone got ::god command[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Nick-World, post:3, topic:386526”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=482283.msg3532012#msg3532012 date=1300243619]
Simple

Commands class

if (playerCommand.startsWith("god")) c.god = true;

In your client class declare this

Then in your Process() method add this

if(god == true) { c.playerStandIndex = 1501; c.playerWalkIndex = 1851; c.playerRunIndex = 1851; }
[/quote]
where is the process()[/quote]
In your client class.

Read full topic
